title: Amazon KDP Publishing Tutorial 2022 - I Found 7 Low Competition KDP NICHES Under 12 Minutes!
description:
Today I decided to do a Live KDP Niches Research video to show you my process of finding low competition niches. I have used Book Bolt's Cloud tool which is an awesome tool to find profitable kdp niche ideas.

👉 Book Bolt: http://bit.ly/Book_Bolt (20% Off Coupon Code: subha20)

In this live video of fewer than 12 minutes, I have managed to find 7 low-competition notebook niches. All these niches have very good BSRs and have low competition.

For interiors, you can check out creative fabric or you can create yourself within Canva.

✨ Creative Fabrica Free Trial: http://bit.ly/3TEDBZm

Read Blog Post: https://lowcontentprofits.com/profitable-low-competition-kdp-niches/ (7 PROFITABLE LOW COMPETITION KDP NICHES IN 12 MINUTES!)
